TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripDropDownButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem

summary.span: 表示控制項，當使用者按下此控制項後就會顯示關聯的 ，讓使用者可以從中選取單一項目。

span.span: Represents a control that when clicked displays an associated from which the user can select a single item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 看起來像，但它會顯示下拉式區域中，當使用者按一下它。 looks like , but it shows a drop-down area when the user clicks it. 隱藏或顯示的下拉式箭號，藉由設定屬性。Hide or show the drop-down arrow by setting the property. 主機，會顯示溢位的項目。 hosts a that displays items that overflow the . 使用啟動色彩選擇器等熟悉的下拉式清單控制項。Use the to activate familiar drop-down controls such as color pickers. 設定屬性設`true`更清楚地向使用者指出進一步的選項可供使用下拉式清單。Set the property to `true` to more clearly indicate to the user that further options are available on the drop-down list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示三控制於何時按下。The following code example displays three controls when the is clicked. 按鈕會變更表單的前景色彩。The buttons change the foreground color of the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip1/VB/form1.vb#5)]

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for this instance.

returns.span: 此 執行個體的新協助工具物件。

span.span: A new accessibility object for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的執行個體支援的 UI 自動化展開/摺疊模式。The instance returned by this method supports the UI Automation expand/collapse pattern. 不過，它僅供以.NET Framework 4.7.1 或更新版本執行的應用程式，而且其中一個重新撰寫為.NET Framework 4.7.1 為目標，或藉由使用 AppCompat 參數選擇在這個.NET Framework 協助工具增強功能。However, it's only available in applications that are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later versions and are either recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or opt in to this .NET Framework accessibility enhancements by using an AppCompat switch. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 移轉指南](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms)。For more information, see the [migration guide](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseDown(class System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseDown (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
